Uses of Package
com.quinsoft.zeidon

  • Packages that use com.quinsoft.zeidon 
    Package Description
    com.quinsoft.zeidon
    Provides all the standard classes and interfaces necessary for client applications written in Zeidon.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.config
    Provides classes for configuring the Zeidon .Object Engine.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler
    Provides all the implementations of Zeidon DB handlers.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains
    Contains all the standard Zeidon domains.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.jmx
    Declares the Object Engine JMX interface and a default implementation.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.objectdefinition
    The classes that are used at runtime to define Zeidon LODs and applications.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe
    Provides the standard Java implementation of the com.quinsoft.zeidon interfaces.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.utils
    Provides some utility classes for use by Zeidon applications.
  • Classes in com.quinsoft.zeidon used by com.quinsoft.zeidon 
    Class and Description
    AbstractOptionsConfiguration
    Common code for getting activate/commit configuration values from task config.
    ActivateFlags
    Enum of Activate flags.
    ActivateOptions
    Encapsulates all activate options.
    ActivateOptions.ActivateOrder
    Used to specify the ordering used on an activate.
    Activator
    Defines the interface for an activator object that is used to activate OIs.
    Application
    The class for retrieving information about a Zeidon application.
    AttributeInstance
    Represents an attribute value in a Zeidon OI.
    Blob
    A simple wrapper around byte[] so that it can be treated as a comparable object.
    CacheMap
    Cache maps are a way to store objects in Zeidon objects in a thread-safe way.
    CommitFlags
    Enum of commit flags.
    CommitOptions
    Optional options for commit.
    Committer
    Interface that defines methods used to commit an object to a DB.
    CompareEntityOptions
    Defines the options that can be used when comparing entities.
    CopyAttributesBuilder
    Convenience class to build flags for setMatchingAttributesByName.
    CreateEntityFlags 
    CursorPosition 
    CursorResult 
    DeserializeOi
    Encapsulates all options available for activating OI's from streams and offers convenience methods activate() and activateFirst().
    DropTaskCleanup
    Every task keeps track of work that needs to be done when the task is dropped.
    DropViewCleanup 
    DuplicateOiOptions
    Options to be used by View.duplicateOi()
    EntityCache
    Keeps track of information for an Entity Cache.
    EntityConstraintType
    List of possible EntityConstraint types.
    EntityCursor
    References the currently selected entity instance in a view.
    EntityCursor.CursorStatus 
    EntityInstance 
    EntityIterator 
    EventData
    Interface that defines data that can be retrieved by a Zeidon EventListener.
    EventNotification
    This is used to give the application notification of different OI events.
    IncludeFlags
    List of options available when including a subobject.
    InvalidAttributeValueException 
    Level
    Designates the different levels for view names.
    NullCursorException
    An attempt was made to access a cursor that is null.
    ObjectConstraintType 
    ObjectEngine
    This is the main container of all Zeidon objects.
    Pagination
    Sets up pagination options to be used as part of an activate.
    SelectSet
    An interface for keeping track of selected entities.
    SerializeOi
    Encapsulates options for writing an OI to a file/writer and includes some convenience methods for performing the write.
    SetMatchingFlags
    Flags used for calling setMatchingAttributesByName.
    StreamFormat
    Stream formats that are supported automatically by Zeidon OI (de-)serialization.
    StreamReader
    Used to deserialize (i.e.
    StreamWriter
    Defines the methods needed to write an OI to a stream.
    SubobjectValidationException 
    Task
    All methods operating on a task.
    TaskQualification
    Objects that implement this interface can be used to find a Zeidon task.
    UnknownApplicationException 
    UnknownLodDefException 
    View
    A View is the main interface for manipulating Zeidon data organized in Object Instances (OIs).
    WriteOiFlags 
    ZeidonException
    The base exception class for all Zeidon-specific exceptions.
    ZeidonException.ExceptionHandler 
    ZeidonLogger
    Interface that mirrors Apache's log4j but uses String.format() to format log messages.
